messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority... This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: Passing our Brexit deal – which is oven ready and that it means we can get on with the country's priorities.
issues.economy: More police enforcing the laws; more nurses and doctors manning the hospitals and paying for their training.
issues.education: £39 billion extra for the NHS. So you should not have to wait... And extra funding for every pupil in every school.

quotes.text: Let's put the last three years behind us. Let's move on as a country and get on with our priorities.
